name: Uno / Uno Skipbo / Uno Freefall
description: UNO Be the first player or team to score 500 points in this classic family game! Play your cards by matching color, number, or word with the top card on the discard pile. When you have one card left, don't forget to yell "UNO"! SKIP-BO® SKIP-BO combines skill, strategy and fun in a game that the whole family can play together! Be the first to play all of the cards in numerical sequence from your stockpile to win. UNO Freefall UNO Freefall is a new twist on an old classic! Six animated themed backgrounds provide the backdrop for more exciting and fast-paced UNO fun! Challenge yourself in four different game modes, Classic, Flippy, Perfect Match or Timed modes!
